title: r/Maliciouscompliance You Want the Cops? Sure Thing, Criminal!
description:
r/Maliciouscompliance When two self-righteous store clerks break the law by destroying OP's driver's license, they taunt OP and threaten to call the cops. You want the cops? Sure thing, morons! OP calls the cops and explain that they committed a crime, so naturally the 2 clerks get arrested. Malicious compliance? More like malicious justice! If you like this video and want to see more, hit the subscribe button for daily Reddit videos!

Watch on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GT6pCENj3K0
dc:creator: rSlash Reads Reddit
